translations: 1. 痛击，重击：用力击打或攻击某人或某物。
· The boxer was clobbering his opponent.
这位拳击手正在痛击他的对手。
2. 彻底击败：在竞争或比赛中轻松地击败对手。

sentences.sentence: This prevents users from clobbering each other.
sentences.translation: 这会防止用户相互冲突。

sentences.sentence: Other metals have suffered a similar clobbering.
sentences.translation: 其它金属价格亦遭受了同样的痛击。

sentences.sentence: "There was a time when the clobbering confidence was considered cool," he said.
sentences.translation: “有段时间大家都觉得超级自信地大声嚷嚷是一种很酷的表现，事实上不是这样的，”他说。
